title: Classification of qubit cellular automata on hypercubic lattices
authors: Andrea Pizzamiglio, Alessandro Bisio, Paolo Perinotti
abstract:
We classify qubit QCAs on lattices $\mathbb Z^s$ with von Neumann
neighbourhood scheme, in terms of feasibility as finite depth quantum circuits.
We show the most general structure of such quantum circuit and use its
characterisation to simulate a few steps of evolution and evaluate the rate of
entanglement production between one cell and its surroundings.
